head.title: Lover of Bright Colors Always Finds Her Coat

hedline.hl1: Lover of Bright Colors Always Finds Her Coat

block.p: I am one of the colorful few who cannot relate to black clothing (''Those Clothes: So Mysterious. So Powerful. So Dark,'' Oct. 1). For years, lime has been my black, orange my navy and turquoise my gray. It help me stand out in crowds and hopefully be more memorable (beneficial in my dual profession, public relations and teaching).

I am one of the colorful few who cannot relate to black clothing (''Those Clothes: So Mysterious. So Powerful. So Dark,'' Oct. 1). For years, lime has been my black, orange my navy and turquoise my gray. It help me stand out in crowds and hopefully be more memorable (beneficial in my dual profession, public relations and teaching).
And besides, I can spot my lime coat from across the room in an instant, while everyone else runs the risk of taking home someone else's wrap.
